summary: CONSUMER CONTACTED DEALER REGARDING APPOINTMENT FOR RECALL REMEDY 02V274000.  WHILE ON THE PHONE, DEALER ADVISED CONSUMER THAT THEY COULD NOT FIND PERSONAL VEHICLE FILE, AND THEN ASKED IF VEHICLE WAS PURCHASED FROM DEALERSHIP.  WHEN CONSUMER ADVISED NO, THE DEALER REPLIED THAT HE WOULD NOT HAVE ANY APPOINTMENTS AVAILABLE UNTIL 07/24/03.  *AK
